feat.value: Apa Cassian said, 'A nobleman (senator?) said, after he renounced all his possessions, he gave them to the poor.
He set a little for himself because of his own needs.
He did not wish to live in complete renunciation, of humility of heart.
This one also spoke a word to him, that is, Basimos, the one who is among the saints,
who said, 'The elite (senatorial?) rank, you lost it; and monasticism, you did not find it.
